amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to enforce certain requirements with respect to added sugars in the rules issued by the Food and Drug Administration on nutrition labels.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3595 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3595 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Collins to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5501) To prohibit the use of funds to enforce certain requirements with respect to added sugars in the rules issued by the Food and Drug Administration on nutrition labels.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3595 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Collins to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3595 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
